contentList.content: Fortify your mind. Don't let anything in.
Save your strength for the brain. You will need it.
We must be getting close. Stay on your guard.
Be ready for anything.
We will end this, together.
Can you feel it? Stronger than the weight of the world itself.
The brain knows we're here. I'm sure of it.
Must be getting close. I can feel it in every passing thought.
Whenever you're ready, lead the way.
No use wasting time here.
Say whatever you need to, then let's move on.
Be careful. We cannot risk discovery here. Our path is treacherous enough.
Can I have a hug? This might be our last chance.
Can I have a hug? This might be our last chance.
Of course, my dear. Come here.
We will be free. Together.
This body is so... complex. I can feel my mind in every part of it.
It is wonderful. The coming battle will show you just how marvelous your capabilities are now.
Though... how are you feeling? Is there any lingering pain from your ceremorphosis?
Orpheus was the greatest thing I've ever eaten. After a meal like that, I feel incredible.
Physically, I'm fine. I'm more worried about my new diet... I could barely control myself when I assimilated Orpheus. I don't want to hurt anyone I care about.
I am happy that your first brain as an illithid was so uniquely delectable.
He will serve as an excellent catalyst for your psionics as well. You will be marvelous in the battles to come.
You may struggle with control at first. However, with time, you will learn how to command your new vessel.
You have overcome much. You will overcome this as well.
Don't worry about me. I feel better than ever.
That is good to hear. I look forward to seeing you fight the Netherbrain in all of your newfound glory.
The transformation was the most excruciating thing I have ever experienced, though I feel relatively fine now.
Yes... it's not something you forget.
I wish the evolution did not require such a harrowing step. But it is over now... for both of us.
I already regret it. I can never go back to living a normal life.
You have every right to feel uncomfortable. I did, at first.
Know, however, that both your future and your form are yours to command. Embrace them, and you will thrive.
The pain was delicious. A stepping stone to greatness.
Better it fuels you than it hinders you, I suppose.
So... how do I look?
You are more enticing than ever. Your mind... I could get lost in it.
Though... I know the agony of ceremorphosis. Are you feeling alright?
What do you think of our chances?
What do you think of our chances?
I will be blunt. You should have spent more time seeking allies. The Netherbrain is not a foe to face alone.
We have few allies, but those that have come to our side are formidable. We can win this.
Our numbers include two illithids and powerful allies. There are few better positions in which we could find ourselves.
Our numbers include two illithids and powerful allies. There are few better positions in which we could find ourselves.
We are two illithids with powerful allies. There are few better positions in which we could find ourselves.
We have acquired powerful allies and grown much over the course of our journey. We are ready.
We have acquired powerful allies, and you have evolved. We have done everything we can to prepare; it is now time to seize our futures for ourselves.
Though... the aftermath of the transformation is rarely straightforward. I hope that, as her partner, you will provide her with any support she requires.
However, we must not underestimate our enemy. One error could bring about our enslavement or death.
However, we must not underestimate our enemy. One error could bring about our enslavement or death.
I expect us to survive. This will be a clash to remember... even if we are enthralled.
I hope that, as her partner, you will assist her with any unforseen challenges she cannot handle alone.
Don't worry. I'll help her with whatever she needs.
She's strong. I doubt she'll need much support, but I'll do what I can.
I'm uncomfortable with her... there's something... off about her now.
I didn't sign up for an illithid partner. She's ugly and slimy now... and the idea of her eating brains is gross.
Good. Your understanding is commendable.
Keep an open mind. Becoming illithid is a social, physical, and mental challenge. Do not abandon her simply because she looks different.
How can you be so shortsighted and self-centered? What you just said is more disgusting than any "ugliness" you perceive!
She is a person. And as a person, she is worthy of respect regardless of what she looks like or what she must eat.
Open your mind. Not only for her sake, but for yours.
Are you ready for the battle against the Netherbrain?
Are you ready for the battle against the Netherbrain?
I am not just ready. I am eager.
Thanks to you, the tyrant that has haunted me for most of my life is finally my prey.
I will see the Netherbrain break.
It's fascinating that this all began with trying to remove the tadpole. I wasn't expecting to embrace it.
I never thought I would be fighting side-by-side with a mind flayer.
We should press on. Leave.
We should press on. Leave.
Indeed. Before I transformed, I never could have predicted the path my life would take.
Indeed. Fate thrusts us into situations we never thought possible. It challenges us, molds us, and guides us. It has certainly thrown much our way over the course of this adventure.
Your adaptability to its challenges is admirable. Once we secure our freedom, you will live a remarkable life.
You adapted to all its challenges. You trusted a mind flayer with your life, while others would have killed it without hesitation.
I will not forget our partnership.
You are inspiring. I am lucky to be by your side.
*As soon as the words leave you, a whisper of fear escapes The Emperor's mind.*
*It is... shy. If you were in private, it would leap at the chance to shower you with affection.*
*Here, though... there are too many eyes.*
I don't want to make you uncomfortable! We can wait until we are alone.
I don't want to make you uncomfortable! We can wait until we are alone.
Ignore the realization.
Ignore the realization.
No... it's alright. I need to hold you now... in case I am not able to later.
You are truly special, my dear.
Can I hug you again?
Can I hug you again?
Indeed. Fate thrusts us into situations we never thought possible. It has certainly thrown much our way over the course of this adventure.
What do you think of Karlach's transformation?
I am relieved it has stabilized her heart. It would have been devastating to see it claim her.
As for the body itself, she is adapting quickly. Her future is bright.
Our relationship is none of your business.
No, it isn't. But I do not want to see Karlach undone by the mental and social isolation of being a renegade mind flayer.
Do not make this harder for her than it has to be.
As for the body itself, she is adapting quickly. Her future is bright.
What do you think of Karlach's transformation?
I am relieved it has stabilized her heart. It would have been devastating to see it claim her.
Though... the aftermath of the transformation is rarely straightforward. I hope that, as her partner, you will provide her with any support she requires.
You are more enticing than ever. Your mind... I could get lost in it.
Though... I know the agony of ceremorphosis. Are you feeling alright?
I am relieved it has stabilized her heart. It would have been devastating to see it claim her.
As for the body itself, she is adapting quickly. Her future is bright.
As for the body itself, she is adapting quickly. Her future is bright.
I am relieved it has stabilized her heart. It would have been devastating to see it claim her.
Do not make this harder for her than it has to be.
I am relieved it has stabilized your heart. It would have been devastating to see it claim you.
I am relieved it has stabilized your heart. It would have been devastating to see it claim you.
I am relieved we no longer need fear your heart's destruction. As for the rest of you... you are more enticing than ever.
Oh, the pain is nothing! I get to live!
I am happy for you. Your future is bright.
